portfolio: Friends of the Artist: A Suite of Seven Etchings and Lithographs
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn. (until d. 2012); by descent to his daughter Catherine Andrus, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
text: This is the colophon—the description of the project—to a portfolio of seven portraits that Barbara Swan made of artist friends who worked in New England. The portraits are of Sigmund Abeles, Bernard Chaet, Michael Mazur, Arthur Polonsky, Harold Tovish, Elbert Weinberg, and Swan herself.
title: Colophon
